product_name: CliniqueHigh Impact Shadow Play Eye Shadow + Definer
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique High Impact Shadow Play Eye Shadow + Definer. A dual-ended eyeshadow stick for full eye looks in a flash. In perfectly curated shade pairs.
details: DetailsBenefitsOne stick. Two tricks. Limitless looks.Pairs two versatile shades and formulas in one mistake-proof tool to create full eye looks anytime, anywhere.On one side, a creamy eye shadow crayon gently glides on full color in one swipe.On the other end, velvety powder with a precision sponge applicator lets you define and add dimension with ease.Creamy eye shadow crayon in a satin finish, powder eyeshadow in soft matte and shimmer finishes.Perfectly curated shade pairs. From soft neutrals to bold blues, there are shades designed to suit all skin tones and moods.Delivers richly pigmented color that's built to last all day. Formulas are crease-proof and sweat- and humidity-resistant.The Clinique Eye Safety Promise: Ophthalmologist tested. Safe for sensitive eyes. Safe for contact lens wearers.Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.Features12-hour wearCrease-proofNon-fadingNon-settlingNon-cakingItem 2640686How To UseThere are endless ways to play with this multitasking duo. You can wear each shade alone or layer them together to create full eye looks.To use the creamy crayon, pull off the cap and twist the barrel up slightly to expose the crayon tip. Apply as desired, including lid, crease, upper lash line, and below lower lash.IngredientsIsodecyl Neopentanoate, Mica, Silica, Octyldodecanol, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Synthetic Wax, Vegetable reviews.headline: I do like this product
reviews.comments: However, when I opened it one end broke off.  As expensive as it was I was upset.

reviews.headline: Not a good replacement for chubby sticks.
reviews.comments: The double latte is a nice color but feels dry and scratchy when blending. I dont use the powder side so I have no opinion on it. I didn't find this comparable to chubby sticks at all.  Also, You pay over 60% more for less than half the product. I will be switching to Laura Mercier or Nudestix.

reviews.headline: I will buy this again!
reviews.comments: This is my favorite eyeshadow pen. I love this rose color. It goes on smoothly and easily.

reviews.headline: Hard to blend, use
reviews.comments: Love the color!! But this is disappointing. The shadow side is hard to get the hang of, either too much or too light. Hard to blend

reviews.headline: Best Eyeshadow
reviews.comments: Easy to use, stays on all day, and love the color combo.  You will not be disappointed in purchasing this eyeshadow.

reviews.headline: Love it but small quantity for price
reviews.comments: Love yhis. I ordered Royal Couple and yhe two shades pair well. The shadow stick side is shiny but applied and stays well. The definer darker color also blended really well. I will likely repurchase, but I will be salty about the price point and will likely just stick to one color instead of trying multiple. Its too expensive to risk not loving it.

reviews.headline: Caffe au lait? try bruise colored
reviews.comments:
I got this for free with my Ulta order and WOW I'm glad I didn't buy it. I got the color Caffe au Lait so like "coffee and milk" but the color was a shimmery flesh color and the blunt end was a patch-y brown. And if they're layered or blended at all it literally makes a perfect bruise color for my skin tone. Definitely NOT what I'm going for. 
It also just rubbed itself away? By me blinking...
Caused an itching and burning on my eyelids as well.

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: I read the reviews and was apprehensive to purchase but figured I'd give it a try. I am so happy and impressed with this eyeshadow. I have purchased it in a couple of different colors and will be purchasing more.

reviews.headline: Couldn't wait to try it.
reviews.comments: Stick applies well to the first eye. Unfortunately, I couldn't get much out of the stick while applying to the 2nd eye. I returned it.

reviews.headline: Just okay
reviews.comments: It's basically just an eye shadow.  I really miss their color sticks.  They went on so easily and stayed on.  Please bring them back.

reviews.headline: The concept is nice (2 in one) but
reviews.comments: The concept is nice (2 in one) but the lighter shadow is greasy and looks cakey - I have wasted good money when  cheaper shadows will suffice.

reviews.headline: I would buy this shadow again!!
reviews.comments: Love the colors.

reviews.headline: Not 100% sure how best to use it, but I like it okay
reviews.comments: I wish I could have found someone to show me how best to use this, because I feel like I'm missing something. It's fine. Nothing more.

reviews.headline: Great eye shadow
reviews.comments: It was an impulse buy but baby when I used it I came back for a second one!!!

reviews.headline: awesome product!
reviews.comments: I reach for these all the time, they are easy and long lasting

reviews.headline: Loved it
reviews.comments: Glides just as easy as my laura mercier stick and love having two shades

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: This product glides on very easily. I do use an eye shadow concealer before I apply the product and it lasts all day. The product does not crease and blends very well for a beautiful effect

reviews.headline: Great Duo Eye Colors
reviews.comments: Like the color pairings of each stick.  Use sparingly as a little goes a long way.  I use the cream lightly on most of lid and apply the powder on outer area using an IT eye brush to blend and apply more powder.  Also apply powder using the IT brush to the underneath eye area.  Otherwise, the powder was too heavy looking for my preference.  Shadow lasts all day on my oily eyelids with no creasing.  I receive many compliments on the Cafe Au Lait!  Only complaint is I cannot tell when the powder is almost empty and the stick side falls out at times.

reviews.headline: Great color
reviews.comments: The best and most versatile eye shadow I have ever used. Wears all day, and the colors are beautiful.

reviews.headline: I will continue to use this product.
reviews.comments: Great product.

media.headline: Not easy to use, powder creases

faceoff_positive.comments: I absolutely LOVE this product!  My makeup bag has been bogged down by shadows and liners for decades in order to get just the right smokey eye or professional day or even back in my modeling days when dramatic eyes were a must.  It's an all in one solution. The creamy side blends beautifully and the shadow, which also blends better than anything I've ever used, is perfect for casual to formal. It's easy to add to the look for evening with a few simple strokes.  I REALLY hope the negative reviews don't impact availability of this most excellent product.  I've bought five different shades and am buying more today.  Great for both young and older skin.  Lasts all day and never gets sticky or hard to blend. Clinique, you hit the ball out of the park with this duo stick!
faceoff_positive.headline: The Best Eyes ever!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I have been using Clinique makeup for at least 20 years and have loved the chubby sticks for as long as they have been around. I am devastated that they were discontinued. 
This product is an awful replacement for the chubby sticks. The cream shadow is pretty similar in composition, but the stick is narrower and shorter. So it gets mediocre coverage and runs out quickly. It's absolutely not worth the price if you are looking for a product to replace the chubby sticks. 
The 'powder' side of the product is okay. It doesn't blend well with the applicator. I always end up with far too much/too dark or I end up blending it with my fingers. 
This product manages to disappoint me with both sides. I will be looking into other brands for my makeup needs going forward.
faceoff_negative.headline: Bad replacement for chubby sticks
